name: Mafia42
description:
Welcome to Mafia42, a mobile version of Mafia you can play casually at home or on-the-go with players all around the world!

Mafia42 is a chat-based game where players actively interact and test their wits.
Players are divided into two teams, the Mafia and the Citizens, and each player is assigned a different occupation. Each night and day, players use their special abilities such as Murder, Heal, or Investigate on other players. During the day, players can freely debate to find out and eliminate the real Mafia.

Strategize, deceive and convince others, and unveil mysteries to win in this social game!

FEATURES:
-13 fun and unique occupations with more to come!
-Every player is assigned a special role such as the Spy, Psychic, Politician, etc.
-Play and chat with your friends
-Join a guild to socialize and interact with other players
-Multiple game modes let you play casually, competitively and privately
-Complete daily quests to receive special bonuses
-Collect rare icons by completing hidden missions
-Customize your account with various items such as skins and nameplates


NOTE: Mafia42 is free to play, but optional in-game items require payment.
Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download the game.
This game requires network connection to play.
